name: Walls in Dead
description: You managed to get free from the underground laboratory where experiments were carried out over you and to take over the machine. Now you have to kill all the guards to get out of the labyrinths of the secret dungeon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 144 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz or higer Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 144 MB available space
